Yeah, I'm just gonna fix those autocard tags. Combos ridiculously with Thornbite Staff (it just destroys all tapped creatures). Also combos well with Urabrask the Hidden (@colvinced there's no comma, unlike ", the" dragons.

Combos well with Repel the Darkness, new card Dispatch, one half of Blinding Beam, all five versions of Blinding Mage. I see UBW control.

@Henrietta: Tapping Royal Assassin is irrelevant, because the cost is immediate and doesn't use the stack. They can kill Royal Assassin, but his ability is still on the stack and will still resolve.

posts.post_content: Classic card, shame gatherer makes it so hard to comment on assassins. I mean, seriously, I have amassed so many assassins that I've assimilated them into almost all my decks. posts.post_content:
this art is beautiful. the content is a little strange, but the skills that created it are amazing. Mark Zug is a great artist.  
  
also this is an amazing card, being able to tap in response to an attack being declared or an ability being activated is brilliant.   
  
sure it's body is small but you'r not really gonna b attacking with, him.  
he's boltable but resists doom blades and such.  
  
overall a great card.
